error.notYourVoucher: {prefix}This voucher is bound to another player.
error.alreadyHasVip: {prefix}You already have an active VIP. Wait until it expires to activate another one.
error.activationFailed: {prefix}Could not activate the VIP right now.
player.receivedVoucher: {prefix}You received a {vipDisplay} VIP voucher. Right click to activate.
broadcast.vipActivated.title: {vipPlain}
broadcast.vipActivated.subtitle: {player} activated a VIP
broadcast.vipActivated.multi.title: {count} players activated VIP
broadcast.vipActivated.multi.subtitle: Latest: {player} activated a VIP {vipPlain}.
broadcast.vipActivated.mega.title: ╰(*°▽°*)╯ SERVER IS ON FIRE ╰(*°▽°*)╯
broadcast.vipActivated.mega.subtitle: {count} activations! Latest: {player2},{player1}.
admin.help:
{prefix} &aJVIPS Commands:
&e/vips givekey <vip> <player> &7[--duration 1d2h10m]
&e/vips givecmd <id> <player> &7— Command voucher
&e/vips add <player> <vip> &7[--duration 1d2h10m]
&e/vips remove <player> <vip>
&e/vips list &7[--player name] [--page N]
&e/vips history &7[--player name] [--page N]
&e/vips chest &7— VIP virtual chest
&e/vips reload
admin.remove.none: {prefix}Nothing to remove: player has no active VIP or vipId doesn't match.
admin.remove.missingDef: {prefix}VIP removed, but the VIP definition was not found to run commandsOnExpire.
player.vipRemoved: {prefix}Your VIP was removed by an administrator.
admin.list.footer: {prefix}<gray>Use /vips list --page <number> to navigate. Type 'cancel' to exit.</gray>
player.help:
{prefix} &aJVIPS Commands:
&e/vips list &7— Active VIPs on the server
&e/vips list --player name &7— A player VIP
&e/vips history &7— Your VIP history
&e/vips history --player name &7— Another player history
&e/vips chest &7— Open VIP virtual chest
chest.noPermission: {prefix} &cYou do not have permission to use the VIP virtual chest.
error.stackLimitReached: {prefix}Stack limit reached ({maxStack}). You cannot extend this VIP further.
